release.note: Initial Release
Puts a new button on the main toolbar that will launch the "StartUp Project" in the debugger without building the solution first.
`MainToolbarExtras addin v0.1 – Run Startup Project in the debugger <http://www.clarionedge.com/clarion/addins/maintoolbarextras-addin-v0-1-run-startup-project-in-the-debugger.html>`_
You can now define the size of the main toolbar and icons!
`MainToolbarExtras addin v0.2–Set Main Toolbar Size! <http://www.clarionedge.com/clarion/addins/maintoolbarextras-addin-v0-2set-main-toolbar-size.html>`_
Optionally set the size for ALL accessible toolbars in the IDE!
`MainToolbarExtras addin v0.3 – Set ALL Toolbar Sizes! <http://www.clarionedge.com/clarion/addins/maintoolbarextras-addin-v0-3-set-all-toolbar-sizes.html>`_
Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
A few adjustments made to the RunStartUpProjectInDebugger code. This is basically a sync to the latest improvements found in SoftVelocity.Generator.Commands.RunProject in the most recent Clarion 8
Context menu and resizing was not being applied until *after* the first view (code/text/app/etc) was opened.
New toolbar item "Run startup project non-elevated. Button is visible by default, you can hide it using the context menu.
Internal release.

This update adds a new menu item, :menuselection:`Edit --> Application Source` with the shotcut key of :kbd:`Alt-s`. When you are in the application procedure view you can now use :kbd:`Alt-s` to go directly to source view!
Run Non-Elevated now detects if it is being used on XP and calls the standard Run code instead of throwing an exception!
Automatically re-open the StartPage when the solution is closed. Feature is enabled by default, use the context menu on the main toolbar to disable it.

Automatically refresh the startpage after a solution is loaded. * Feature is only active when "Close StartPage when loading a solution is checked off. * Feature is enabled by default, use the context menu on the main toolbar to disable it.
Initial Release
Code refactored for easier development and maintenance (and helped a lot in debugging!)
UpdateOtherToolbars feature was crashing, particularly on multi core machines because of the way the toolbars were being set on Pad items. This now appears to be fixed completely
Set Toolbars form now has spin controls and buttons for setting the size to the C7/C8 defaults automatically
Expand/Collapse all code folds. See :menuselection:`Edit --> Folding`
Editor Font Size - Increase/Decrease/Reset (Reset to the font size found at IDE startup). See :menuselection:`View --> Editor Font Size`.
Toolbar buttons for common edit actions on the **Embeditor/Embed Editor** toolbar (Cut/Copy/Paste/Delete|Undo/Redo)
Handled exception better in RunAbstractCommand. In C8.8973 the termination timing must have changed slightly which exposed an error in this code.
Toolbar icons are now 24x24 so they look better with default toolbar size
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
Options panel is now in ClarionAddins options section!
Removed ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
StartPage is now reloaded on both ViewOpened and ViewClosed workbench events.
StartPage is now reloaded using the current URI rather than the "home" page. Not sure why this wasn't always the case!
The Main toolbar context menu now duplicates the CloseStartPageOnSolutionOpening option from the Project and Solution options panel.
